objects.description: If running on a Huawei device, [Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) adds itself to the protected apps list, which allows it to run with the screen off.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)

external_references.description: A. Blaich, M. Flossman. (2018, April 16). Lookout finds new surveillanceware in Google Play with ties to known threat actor targeting the Middle East. Retrieved September 11, 2020.
